name: Brianna
coverLetter: I have never trimmed before, but I did manage to manage an entire hotel, I would much rather work with my hands and not deal with people's drama all day. I am quick and keen and a great independent worker as well as a good working with others. I left the hotel because I was held hostage at gunpoint and no longer felt safe. I am availible all the time. I do have a vehicle and can get virtually anywhere.
